results.title: Simvastatin Inhibits Histologic Changes Associated with Gastroduodenal Reflux in a Murine Model.
results.text_hl: These findings identify @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ as a potential preventative agent to inhibit the development and progression of @DISEASE_Gastroesophageal_Reflux @DISEASE_MESH:D005764 @@@reflux@@@-induced @<m>DISEASE_Esophagitis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D004941 @@@esophageal injury@@@.

citations.NLM: Gergen AK, Madsen HJ, Li A, Cheng L, Meng X, Fullerton DA, Pratap A, Weyant MJ. Simvastatin Inhibits Histologic Changes Associated with Gastroduodenal Reflux in a Murine Model. Dig Dis Sci. 2022 Oct;67(10):4732-4741. PMID: 35001242
